abstract: Still-emerging boom of oil and gas drilling fields is bringing energy exploration to some new places, and to communities with no experience dealing with it; few areas are facing the prospect of drilling's new frontier more vividly than eastern Colorado.
snippet: The still-emerging boom is bringing energy exploration to communities with no experience dealing with it and areas that were once, in rosier times, earmarked for other uses.
lead_paragraph: The still-emerging boom is bringing energy exploration to communities with no experience dealing with it and areas that were once, in rosier times, earmarked for other uses.

headline.main: Drilling in Fast-Growing Areas Ushers in New Era of Tension
headline.print_headline: Drilling in Fast-Growing Areas Ushers In New Era of Tension
headline.seo: New Era for Drilling Raises Tensions in Fast-Growing Areas
